sys_script_include.description: catalog client script to auto-populate the Office location field when the Requested for field is populated.
sys_script_include.name: GetUserDetails

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_fad5f5a04773211012c73d8a436d433d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_759169_lva.GetUserDetails</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>catalog client script to auto-populate the Office location field when the Requested for field is populated.</description><name>GetUserDetails</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserDetails = Class.create();
GetUserDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getUserLocation: function() {
        var userSysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_user_sys_id');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        if (gr.get(userSysId)) {
            return gr.location.name; // assumes the field on sys_user is named 'location'
        }
        return ''; // return empty string if no location found
    },

    type: 'GetUserDetails'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-29 19:54:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>fad5f5a04773211012c73d8a436d433d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_759169_lva">860fee114767211012c73d8a436d4334</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">860fee114767211012c73d8a436d4334</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fad5f5a04773211012c73d8a436d433d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-29 19:54:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
